translated: Since the former consciousness that is the basis of attachment is established by the mere loss of its capacity, how is the mental faculty established?

original: gang gis yid brtag par 'gyur pa thams cad kyi tshe rnam par shes pa cig car mi skye ba nyid kyang ma yin no zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: gang gis yid brtag par 'gyur pa thams cad kyi tshe rnam par shes pa cig car mi skye ba nyid kyang ma yin no zhes ston pa ni /
translated: It is not the case that consciousness does not arise simultaneously with all that is examined by the mind.

original: lhan cig skye ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skye ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù shows that it is not only with the simultaneously arisen.

original: 'jug pa mtshungs pa la'ang zhes 'ang gi don brjod pa ni gzhan du 'ang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa mtshungs pa la'ang zhes 'ang gi don brjod pa ni gzhan du 'ang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in ‚Äúwith the same activity‚Äù is stated in the sense of ‚Äúelsewhere.‚Äù

original: 'di nyid kyi don bsdus te bstan pa ni thams cad kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi don bsdus te bstan pa ni thams cad kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of this is summarized in the statement ‚Äúwith all.‚Äù

original: mar me du bas mthong zhes bya ba ni mar me gang la 'bras bu mthong ba du ma yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: mar me du bas mthong zhes bya ba ni mar me gang la 'bras bu mthong ba du ma yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe lamp is seen with smoke‚Äù means that the lamp is so called because it is seen with the result of smoke.

original: 'on te lta ba bo du ma'i dbang gis sgron mas shes pa ma bskyed do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te lta ba bo du ma'i dbang gis sgron mas shes pa ma bskyed do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the lamp does not produce consciousness by the power of the many viewers,

original: lan du 'di la yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan du 'di la yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the response is ‚ÄúIn this case also.‚Äù

original: skabs su bab pa'i yul lnga nye bar gnas pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i yul lnga nye bar gnas pa la yang ngo //
translated: The five objects that are present in this case also.

original: khyad par ni de'i bdag nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyad par ni de'i bdag nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: The difference is that they do not become of the nature of that.

original: dus phyis 'byung ba'i phyir dad rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus phyis 'byung ba'i phyir dad rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they arise at different times and because they are different in their objects of faith.

original: 'on te khyad par de gzhan kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te khyad par de gzhan kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But if that difference is something else,

original: de'i tshe ga la @326a * //
analyzed: de'i tshe ga la @326a * //
translated: then how could it be the same?

original: te khyad par de gzhan na yid rtag pa gcig bu'i rang bzhin de'i ci yin te ci yang ma yin no //
analyzed: te khyad par de gzhan na yid rtag pa gcig bu'i rang bzhin de'i ci yin te ci yang ma yin no //
translated: If that difference is something else, then that nature of a single permanent mind is what? It is nothing at all.

original: 'on te khyad par de yid dang 'brel pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te khyad par de yid dang 'brel pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if that difference is related to the mind,

original: yid de dang khyad par de 'brel na'ang khyad par 'di yid de'i yin par 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: yid de dang khyad par de 'brel na'ang khyad par 'di yid de'i yin par 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: then even if the mind and that difference are related, that difference would be of that mind,

original: rang bzhin gcig yin par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩdes na khyad par gzhan skyes kyang snga ma bzhin du yid de skyed par byed pa'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig yin par mi 'gyur ro // des na khyad par gzhan skyes kyang snga ma bzhin du yid de skyed par byed pa'am /
translated: but they would not have the same nature.

original: skyed par mi byed pa thams cad kyi tshe 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyed par mi byed pa thams cad kyi tshe 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, even if another difference arises, the mind would be just as it was before, either producing or not producing that difference.

original: rnam par shes pa de nyid ces bya ba ni lus dang skyes bu dag rtag pas khyad par du 'gyur ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de nyid ces bya ba ni lus dang skyes bu dag rtag pas khyad par du 'gyur ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That consciousness itself is permanent means that it is not tenable that the body and the person are permanent.

original: 'du byed de gang las phyis skye ba yin 'di la gzhan gyis brjod pa ni shes pa las skyes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'du byed de gang las phyis skye ba yin 'di la gzhan gyis brjod pa ni shes pa las skyes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is the cause of that formation? The opponent says that it is born from consciousness.

original: khas len pas gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khas len pas gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent says, ‚ÄúIf that is so,‚Äù

original: 'o na bag chags nyid blo'i skyed byed yin gyi blo ni ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na bag chags nyid blo'i skyed byed yin gyi blo ni ma yin no snyam na /
translated: then the latent impressions themselves are the cause of the arising of consciousness, not consciousness.

original: blo las zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: blo las zhes gsungs so //
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúConsciousness arises from consciousness.‚Äù

original: de lta bu nyid du mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni snang ba'i rang bzhin shes pa skyed par byed pa thams cad ni gzung ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor bar ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid du mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni snang ba'i rang bzhin shes pa skyed par byed pa thams cad ni gzung ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor bar ma mthong ngo //
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúIt is seen in that way.‚Äù The meaning is that all consciousnesses that are the cause of the arising of consciousness that has the nature of appearance are called ‚Äúthe object that is grasped.‚Äù The meaning is that they are not seen in sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi 'o bsam pa ni 'di min te /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi 'o bsam pa ni 'di min te /
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúIf that is so,‚Äù and the opponent‚Äôs opinion is that it is not so.

original: rang bzhin 'gas rnam par shes pa de bskyed pa yin yang gzung bar bya ba ma yin par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'gas rnam par shes pa de bskyed pa yin yang gzung bar bya ba ma yin par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning is that even though consciousness is the cause of the arising of consciousness, it is not the object that is grasped.

original: 'di 'gog pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di 'gog pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúThis is not a refutation.‚Äù

original: shes pa snga ma'i gzung ba'i nus pa gang yin pa de nyams par 'gyur gyi skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni nyams pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa snga ma'i gzung ba'i nus pa gang yin pa de nyams par 'gyur gyi skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni nyams pa ma yin no //
translated: The potency of the object of the prior cognition is impaired, but the nature of the producer is not impaired.

original: des na blo snga ma las shes pa phyi ma skyed par phyed do'i zhe na /
analyzed: des na blo snga ma las shes pa phyi ma skyed par phyed do'i zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the subsequent cognition is produced from the prior cognition.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni de ni mi rigs te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni de ni mi rigs te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this is, ‚ÄúThat is not reasonable.‚Äù

original: de dngos por nges pa ni skyed byed kyi dngos por nges pa'o //
analyzed: de dngos por nges pa ni skyed byed kyi dngos por nges pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIts nature is ascertained as a thing‚Äù means that its nature is ascertained as a producer.

original: skyed par byed pa de ni blo la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa de ni blo la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is a producer exists in cognition.

original: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni gzung ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni gzung ba nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat itself‚Äù refers to the object.

original: der yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis smras pa rings par bgrang ba'i tshe yang ngo //
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis smras pa rings par bgrang ba'i tshe yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that‚Äù refers to the enumeration of the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not‚Äù is the refutation.

original: da ni rnam par rtog par byed de don gyis go ba 'di don nam don rig pa'am gnyi ga las skye grang na /
analyzed: da ni rnam par rtog par byed de don gyis go ba 'di don nam don rig pa'am gnyi ga las skye grang na /
translated: Now, it is analyzed: Is this understanding of the object produced from the object, or from the object-awareness, or from both?

original: re zhig don las ni skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig don las ni skye ba ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not produced from the object.

original: de'i tshe ni don de las rang dang gzhan gyi rgyu la yod pa'i blo thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni don de las rang dang gzhan gyi rgyu la yod pa'i blo thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, all cognitions of self and other that exist in the cause of that object are realized.

original: don ni thun mong yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: don ni thun mong yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the object is common to both.

original: don rtogs pa las kyang don gyi blo rtogs pa tsam du @326b 'gyur gyi 'di nga'i don rtogs pa yin no zhes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don rtogs pa las kyang don gyi blo rtogs pa tsam du @326b 'gyur gyi 'di nga'i don rtogs pa yin no zhes ni ma yin no //
translated: And from the realization of the object, there is the mere realization of the cognition of the object, but not that ‚ÄúI realize this object.‚Äù

original: de nyid phyir na zhes bya ba ni nyes pa bshad zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid phyir na zhes bya ba ni nyes pa bshad zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because of the previously explained fault,

original: 'on te don rig pa las rig pa rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te don rig pa las rig pa rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If, on the other hand, the cognition of the object is the realization of the cognition,

original: don myong ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don myong ba yang zhes bya ba'o //

original: rnam par rtog pa gsum pa la brjod pa ni /

analyzed: gnyis pa ni dpon dang rig pa'o //

analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par dbye ba'o //

original: kho bo cag gis thal bar sgrub pa'i yul gzhan la 'pho bar 'gyur ba ni khyed kyis ma spangs so zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis thal bar sgrub pa'i yul gzhan la 'pho bar 'gyur ba ni khyed kyis ma spangs so zhes dgongs pa'o //

analyzed: 'di nyid gsal 'debs pa ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //

translated: ‚ÄúThe understanding of the object‚Äù such as blue is certainly true.

analyzed: 'on kyang rang nyid ces bya ba rang gi ngo bo kho nas rtogs pa yin gyi shes pa ni brtag par mi bya'o //
translated: However, it is understood by itself, by its own nature alone; it is not to be imagined as consciousness.

original: de yang bdag go //

translated: And that is the self.

original: byed pa po nyid du ni rtogs pa'i'o //

original: des na rang rig pa ma yin te gzhan rig pa'ang yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsam pa'o //
analyzed: des na rang rig pa ma yin te gzhan rig pa'ang yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsam pa'o //

original: ci ltar lus yin snyam na gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: ci ltar lus yin snyam na gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúHow is it the body?‚Äù

original: / gang gi tshe lus nyid rig pa de'i tshe lus rang rig pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: / gang gi tshe lus nyid rig pa de'i tshe lus rang rig pa med pa kho na'o //

original: des zhes bya ba ni bdag gis so //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni bdag gis so //
translated: ‚Äú By that‚Äù means ‚Äúby me.‚Äù

original: bdag rang rig pas nyams su myong ba med kyang bdag nyams su myong ngo zhes bya ba'i tha snyad ji ltar mi 'dod gsal ba shes pas don gsal ba'i phyir ro //

original: rang rig pa ma yin na zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa khas mi len na'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa ma yin na zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa khas mi len na'o //
